mapper.select: SELECT t.id id, t.parent_id parentId, t.total_number totalNumber, t.target_id targetId, t.trade_time tradeTime, t.trade_type tradeType, t.cust_name custName, t.cert_type certType, t.cert_no certNo, t.loan_id loanId, t.loan_name loanName, t.loan_cert_no loanCertN, t.pay_amount payAmount, t.repayment_capital repaymentCapital, t.repayment_interest repaymentInterest FROM t_gq_fss_sftp_credit_info t WHERE t.parent_id=${parentId}

SELECT `id` id, `parent_id` parentId, `total_number` totalNumber, `target_id` targetId, `trade_time` tradeTime, `trade_type` tradeType, `cust_name` custName, `cert_type` certType, `cert_no` certNo, `loan_id` loanId, `loan_name` loanName, `loan_cert_no` loanCertNo, `pay_amount` payAmount, `repayment_capital` repaymentCapital, `repayment_interest` repaymentInterest FROM `t_gq_fss_sftp_credit_info` t
AND t.`cust_name` like CONCAT('%',#{custName},'%')
AND t.`cert_no` like CONCAT('%',#{certNo},'%')
